availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer. Jefferson County, Kentucky, native. Married to Priscilla Boston McHatton in Spencer County, Kentucky, on September 14, 1837. Father of Priscilla Virginia McHatton Jones. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1850. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 285A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 1093.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #13417.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Spencer County Marriages, Film #000482501.
"Isaac McHatton (1808-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #51456656, accessed May 3, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/51456656.
